name: net.featherly.shawn.inputsharedevice
description:
UnityEngine.InputSystem extensions for:
1. Sharing a single device with multiple players (2 players, 1 keyboard). 
2. Multiple players selecting UI from a single canvas. 
3. TextMeshPro based UI prefab for rebinding actions. 

Rebinding combines UnityEngine.InputSystem.Samples.RebindUI , Sasquatch B https://youtu.be/qXbjyzBlduY , & Samyam https://youtu.be/csqVa2Vimao
author: ShawnFeatherly <> (https://shawn.featherly.net)
